original_text: You came only yesterday. And today shall I make you wander about with us, when I do not know where I am going? Go back, and take your people with you. May the Lord show you kindness and faithfulness.”
korean_text: 너는 어제 왔고 나는 정처 없이 가니 오늘 어찌 너를 우리와 함께 떠돌아다니게 하리요 너도 돌아가고 네 동포들도 데려가라 은혜와 진리가 너와 함께 있기를 원하노라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And today shall I make you wander about with us,
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 오늘 내가 너로 우리와 함께 떠돌게 하겠느냐,

sentences.original_text: when I do not know where I am going?
and take your people with you.
May the Lord show you kindness
